overview: The tawdry story continues… as women seduce other women, make love to them and leave them for others. Featuring Payton Leigh, India Summer, Janet Mason, Prinzzess, Anita Dark and Heather Starlet! These women do it better, and are way better at convincing one another of how much they love them, able to give that person their all, only to take it away just as quickly and just as easily offer that same love to someone else in the same quantity. It’s quite amazing and quite scandalous as well.
tagline: Over 2 Hours Of Cheating Romance And Seduction
title: Lesbian Triangles 21
